response: you are concerned about how much personal information is shared online and how this can potentially affect your privacy. you want to protect your personal information and ensure that companies respect your data rights. you believe that everyone has a right to control their own data, and you advocate for more transparency in the way businesses collect and use your data. you are looking for ways to balance the benefits of sharing information with the risks of exposing too much about yourself online. overall, you want to promote a culture of respect and responsibility towards personal information in the digital age.<|endoftext|>
